p: A randomized controlled trial carried out by Kadam et al. [ 157] using a mixture of 8 herbal plants, including H. pubescens (1.02 g/10 g), for control of dental plaque and gingivitis. Both UDM toothpowder and standard control treatment yielded a statistically significant reduction in scores of gingival index and plaque. Another randomized clinical study with 32 children (3–12 years) with Bhunimbadi-Vati that contains nine herbals including H. pubescens, shows relief of “ Mukha Vairasya” (bad taste in mouth) and “ Tikta Amlodgara” (sour and better belching efficacy) [ 158].
